snippet: The Campaign for Primary Accountability, which aims to defeat longtime Congressional incumbents, is supporting State Senator Adriano Espaillat, a Democratic opponent of Representative Charles B. Rangel’s.
abstract: Campaign for Primary Accountability, anti-incumbent super PAC based in Texas, is supporting New York State Senator Adriano Espaillat in the Democratic primary race against incumbent Rep Charles B Rangel for his Congressional seat. (M)l
lead_paragraph: State Senator Adriano Espaillat's campaign to unseat Representative Charles B. Rangel received a boost on Tuesday from an unexpected quarter, when a ''super PAC'' based in Texas announced that it planned to support Mr. Espaillat against Mr. Rangel. The group, called the Campaign for Primary Accountability, has received most of its financing from a few businessmen with histories of donating to Republican causes, but it describes itself as nonpartisan and says its mission is to defeat longtime Congressional incumbents on the right and the left.

headline.main: Seeing Rangel as Vulnerable, 'Super PAC' Backs Opponent
